General.Name: Saudi Paper Manufacturing Co.
General.Description: Saudi Paper Manufacturing Company manufactures and sells tissue papers in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, Gulf Cooperation Council countries, and internationally. The company operates through Manufacturing, and Trading and Others segments. It offers facial and pocket tissues, toilet paper, kitchen towels, napkins, industrial tissues, and maxi rolls; and table napkins, under pad, and interfold under the Mouchoir, Excellence, City, SPC Pro, and Jumbo Roll brands. The company also manufactures, buys, and distributes pulps and papers; and collects, sorts, transports, and presses waste papers. Saudi Paper Manufacturing Company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Dammam, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

2.Name: Mr. Mohammed bin Abdullah Mohammed Al Manea
